Yukari is a manipulative mastermind and is secretive about her real goals. Yukari is friendly towards Reimu but messes with her. Yukari is best friends with Yuyuko, friends with Suika, and Ran is her Shikigami. Yukari is tall and mature-looking. Yukari has gold eyes and very long blonde hair with many red ribbons. She wears a purple tabard with trigrams over a pale pink Western dress with black sleeve cuffs. Yukari wears a pink mob cap with a red ribbon, and usually carries a parasol.

231.content: Yuugi Hoshiguma is an oni. She wields the power of unexplained phenomena. Yuugi lives in Former Hell's Hot Spring Town, which she manages. She is very blunt, straightforward, and dislikes weakness. Yuugi's physical strength defies description. Yuugi is Suika's best friend. Yuugi has red eyes, a single long starry red horn on her forehead, and long blonde hair. She wears a white short-sleeved shirt with red trim, a dark blue semi-transparent skirt with red highlights, and geta sandals. Yuugi has broken manacles on her wrists and carries a starry red sake dish that improves any sake poured in it.

232.content: Kasha are hell cats who steal corpses from funerals and bring them to the Hell of Blazing Flames as fuel to regulate its heat.

233.content: Makai is a location behind the Hakurei Shrine in the mountains. Access to it is sealed, but there are ways to go around it. It is created by Shinki. A toxic miasma fills the air, which is poisonous to normal beings but increases magical power. It houses mostly demons. The Ruins of Vina, Fallen Temple, Makai City, World of Ice and Snow, Pandaemonium, Wonderland, and Hokkai are found in Makai.

234.content: The Fallen Temple is located somewhere in Makai. It's a giant broken down temple with a giant crucifix hanging in the lobby. It houses the angel of death Sariel.

235.content: The World of Ice and Snow is located somewhere in Makai. It's a barren snowy wasteland with a frozen river running through. Yuki and Mai live around here.

236.content: The Wonderland is a location in Makai created in the distant past by Alice Margatroid. Alice visits it sometimes.

237.content: Pandaemonium is located in Makai right after the World of Ice and Snow. It's a giant Fortress made of a crystalline material built by and houses Shinki. It's in a devastated state after Shinki lost control.

238.content: Ellen is a witch wandering Gensokyo. She looks very young but she's actually immortal while having a childish mindset. Ellen is short, has long blonde hair, and yellow eyes. She wears a red and white dress and a red bow on her head.

239.content: Elly is a former shinigami. She is the servant of Yuuka Kazami and gatekeeper of Mugenkan. She's excitable but lonely. Elly uses a scythe to fight. She has curly shoulder-length blonde hair and yellow eyes. Elly wears a pink hat with a red ribbon, a dark red and pink dress and red shoes.

240.content: Louise is a demon found in Makai. She's really polite and will often try not to push things too far. She wants to leave Makai. Louise has yellow eyes and short yellow hair. She wears a white hat with a purple birron and a white dress with a purple collar.

241.content: Mini-Hakkero is a magical device owned by Marisa Kirisame. It can fire the Master Spark. The Mini-Hakkero is a hand-sized, octagonal piece of wood inscribed with eight Taoist trigrams. Its internal components are made from hihiirokane. It can generate intense heat and magical energy, and the continuous beam it fires looks like a giant laser of rainbow energy.

242.content: Kourindou is an antique store owned by Rinnosuke located between the Forest of Magic and the Human Village. It supposedly sells antiques and has an extensive inventory. It is mostly a place to barter for items from the outside world. Kourindou gets very little customers and is rather poorly maintained. Marisa visits Kourindou regularly.

243.content: Master Spark is Marisa's signature spellcard. The Master Spark is a gigantic laser beam fired from the Mini-Hakkero. It is incredibly strong and intimidating. The idea was stolen from Yuuka Kazami.

244.content: The Purification Rod or "gohei" is owned by Reimu Hakurei. It is used to exterminate youkai. Reimu uses her gohei to fire danmaku.

245.content: Kakashi Spirit News is ran by Hatate Himekaidou and is the rival of Bunbunmaru Newspaper. It uses spirit photography, so the articles are very in-depth and informative, but also from the past, so the information is outdated.

246.content: Keystones are holy rocks that can suppress earthquakes or cause them. Tenshi rides them and uses them to fight. They are lumps of black granite wrapped with shimenawa ropes.

247.content: Lunar veils are pieces of cloth sewn with pure moonlight allowing the wearer to fly around freely, including through space.

248.content: Ofuda are talismans for purification, exorcism, or protection in Shinto religion.

249.content: Onbashira are blessed wooden pillars that Kanako uses to fight, either as projectiles or as melee weapons.

250.content: The Probability Space Hypervessel is a large ship that's capable of time travel. Its captain Yumemi Okazaki and its lone crew member Chiyuri Kitashirakawa used this vessel to travel to Gensokyo in order to prove the existence of magic.

251.content: Yama are the judges of life and death of Gensokyo. They judge spirits ferried by shinigami across the Sanzu River. Each Yama has a rod of remorse.

252.content: Lord Tsukuyomi is the brother of Amaterasu and lord of the Lunar Capital. He is a few million years old.

253.content: Gensokyo's moon is like Earth, with green fields and lakes. Lunarians and Moon Rabbits live in the safety of the Lunar Capital.

254.content: The Lunarian Capital is a large city inhabited by the lunarians and moon rabbits. Its technology and weaponry are far more advanced than the Outside World. It is located on the moon. The Lunar Defence Corps is it's military force. It is home to Toyohime, Yorihime, Rei'sen, Sagume and Tsukuyomi.

255.content: Watatsuki no Yorihime is a lunarian princess and the younger sister of Toyohime. Yorihime can borrow power from gods, can absorb knowledge and is a superb swordswoman. Yorihime's strength and skills are unmatched by anyone in Gensokyo or the moon. Udongein was her pet and Rei'sen is her current pet. Yorihime respects Eirin as her former teacher. Yorihime is the leader of the Lunar Defense Corps, she is seen as stern and serious. Yorihime has brown eyes and light purple hair tied into a ponytail with a yellow ribbon. She wears a white short-sleeved blouse with a dark red dress over it, golden bracelets, short red boots and a large belt.

256.content: Rei'sen is a moon rabbit and the pet of Yorihime and Toyohime. She has the ability to teleport short distances. Rei'sen was formerly a soldier of the Lunar Defense Corps. She is a little shy and easily intimidated. Rei'sen has short light purple hair, red eyes and white fluffy bunny ears. She wears a black business suit, a white shirt, a red tie, a grey skirt, black kneesocks and loafers.

257.content: Hell Ravens are found in Hell where they help maintain the Remains of Blazing Hell. They are humanoids with black wings and able to control fire, but are not Tengu.

258.content: The Sanzu River is where spirits cross over to the Netherworld by paying a shinigami's boat ride. Komachi Onozuka is the ferrywoman. Only Shinigami and passengers can cross the river, everything else will sink and suffer a horrible fate.

259.content: Senkai is an area similar to Gensokyo created Toyosatomimi no Miko for her and her followers. It is a realm where hermits can rest and meditate without being interrupted by others. It's accessed via the principle that any crack contains limitless space, which connects the world to any other location allowing it to be accessed from anywhere.

260.content: The Garden of the Sun is located in the heart of Gensokyo. Sunflowers are everywhere in the Garden. Lots of youkai and fairies gather at this spot for concerts or for flower viewing. It's hard to leave the Garden. In the middle of the garden lies Mugenkan. Yuuka, Elly and Eternity Larva can be found here.

261.content: The Ruins of Vina are located somewhere in Makai. It used to be a giant castle but now it houses a demon known as Elis.

262.content: The Forest of Magic is located near the Human Village. Many magicians live in this forest for the sake of increasing their magical powers with hallucinogenic mushrooms, and it is home to many repulsive things. Ignoring the dangerous environment, it's both a safe and secretive place to seclude oneself, or a fairly nice place to live for people who don't like to be disturbed. Marisa, Alice and Rinnosuke all live in the Forest of Magic.

263.content: The Dream World is a world of dreams ruled by the baku. You have to be asleep in order to reach it. Doremy Sweet lives here.

264.content: Earth rabbits are natives of Gensokyo often wielding great magic capabilities and the ability to transform into either a rabbit or a girl with rabbit ears. Tewi leads the earth rabbits. They live in the Bamboo Forest of the Lost. They have allied themselves with the residents of Eientei and work there.

265.content: Nue are chimera-like youkai and extremely rare in Gensokyo. They are able to make themselves and other objects unrecognizable to the point that they looks like something completely different.

266.content: Wind God's Lake is located on top of the Youkai Mountain, next to Moriya Shrine. It has holy properties.

267.content: The Canal of Willows is a forest of willow trees located near the Human Village. It's said to be peaceful as there are rarely any youkai wandering the area.

268.content: Higan is on the other side of the Sanzu River. Higan has no night or day, no weather, and no seasons. It is an endless expanse of flowers with gentle warmth. Higan is a place where departed souls are judged by Eiki Shiki. Komachi Onozuka lives here. Kutaka Niwatari works here as the gatekeeper.

269.content: Mayohiga is an abandoned village located near the Great Hakurei Barrier somewhere in the mountains. Humans tend to stumble across it when they try to leave Gensokyo without using the Hakurei Shrine. Taking something from Mayohiga gives good luck. Cats live in Mayohiga because Chen brings them there.

270.content: Hatate Himekaidou is a crow tengu living on Youkai Mountain. She can use spirit photography to see things from somewhere else. Her articles are less sensationalist than Aya's, who is her rival. Hatate is really lazy but chipper and friendly. She is a shut in and rarely leaves home. Hatate has brown eyes and brown hair in pigtails with purple ribbons. She wears a pink shirt with a frilly collar, black tie, a purple tokin, a checkered purple and black skirt, and geta sandals.

271.content: Mamizou Futatsuiwa is a bake-danuki. She can disguise herself or things around her. Mamizou is mischievous but good-natured and quite responsible. She lives in the Tanuki Forest, is a guest of the Myouren Temple and a friend of Nue. She lends money to poor humans. Mamizou has brown eyes, light brown shoulder-length hair, tanuki ears, and a giant, fluffy striped tail. She wears a green leaf on her head, and glasses. Mamizou wears a pink shirt with a leather apron, a skirt striped like her tail, and carries a bottle of sake.

272.content: Hakugyokurou is a ghost shrine located in the Netherworld. The youkai cherry tree Saigyou Ayakashi is dormant in its gardens. Hakugyoukurou is the home of Yuyuko and Youmu.

273.content: The Youkai Tanuki Forest is located near the Human Village. The Youkai Tanuki Forest houses all sorts of youkai and tanuki. Mamizou Futatsuiwa can be seen around there.

274.content: The Lake of Blood is a lake in the mountains that appears to be filled with pure blood, rather than water. Within it lies the entrance to Mugenkan. Kurumi is the gatekeeper of the entrance to the lake. Elly stands guard within the lake, at the border between Gensokyo and the Fantasy World, protecting the entrance to Mugenkan.

275.content: Lyrica Prismriver is a poltergeist keyboardist and the third Prismriver sister. Her music enhances the effect of Merlin's and Lunasa's. She lazy and crafty. Lyrica has brown eyes and short light brown hair. Her red keyboard is always nearby. She wears red clothing dress with pink and black trimming over a white shirt, red shorts, and a red hat with a green star decoration. She's the shortest Prismriver sister.

276.content: Mai Teireida is an immortal human. Mai can increase a person's physical energy by dancing behind them. She lives in the Land of the Backdoor, working for Okina with her partner Satono. Mai is scatterbrained and impulsive but serves Okina unquestioningly. She has short dull green hair with two long side locks, and green eyes. Mai wears a kazaori-eboshi, a green dress with short sleeves, a white half apron and collar with red frills and a yellow bow, black kneesocks, and green shoes. She holds a bamboo stalk.

277.content: The Land of the Back Door is a dimension ruled and created by Okina. It's filled with floating doors that can lead to any location in Gensokyo. Satono and Mai live there.

278.content: The Nameless Hill is located on the opposite side of the Youkai Mountain and halfway up a small mountain. It is a meadow filled with purple and white lilies-of-the-valley which are poisonous. Medicine Melancholy lives there.

279.content: The Outside World is modern-day Earth, which is separate from Gensokyo. It is technologically advanced but lacks faith and belief. Gensokyo is closest in culture to old Japan.

280.content: The Nuclear Furnace is located in the deepest parts of the Underworld. It creates nuclear fusion energy for power and heat. Kanako and Suwako built the Nuclear Furnace. Utsuho powers it.

281.content: The Underground Geyser Center is a research facility and located in the deepest parts of the Underworld. It is connected to the Nuclear Furnace. Kappa and the gods of the Moriya Shrine use it for research.

282.content: The Shining Needle Castle is located in the sky near Youkai Mountain. It was created by the Miracle Mallet a long time ago. It is the home to Shinmyoumaru and other inchlings.

283.content: Eientei is a traditional Japanese mansion located in the Bamboo Forest. Its corridors sprawl endlessly. Kaguya is its mistress. It includes a clinic where Eirin works. It is home to Reisen & Tewi.

284.content: Kyouko Kasodani is a yamabiko. She can reflect sounds. She is a Buddhist priestess-in-training at the Myouren Temple and in a band with Mystia. Kyouko is cheerful, dutiful, and energetic but has a bit of a rebellious streak. She has teal hair and teal eyes along with brown dog ears. Kyouko wears a long pale pink dress with teal flower ornaments, a white dress under it with a black trim, and black shoes. She has a short tail and carries a bamboo broom.

285.content: The Myouren Temple was originally a ship. It rests atop the Hall of Dream's Great Mausoleum and has been turned in a Buddhist Temple. It is also called the "Palanquin Ship." Byakuren can make it fly. This is the home of Byakuren, Shou, Nazrin, Ichirin, Murasa, Nue, Kyouko and Mamizou. Koishi and Jo'on can be found here occasionally.

286.content: Marisa Kirisame is a human witch. She uses heat and light magic and receives power from the mini-hakkero. She lives in the Kirisame household in the Forest of Magic. Marisa enjoys finding mushrooms and stealing things she finds interesting. She is outgoing, informal, and loves action. Marisa is friends with Nitori, Alice and Patchouli. Reimu is Marisa's best friend. Marisa's signature attack is "Master Spark". Marisa has blonde hair and yellow eyes. She wears a black vest and skirt, white apron and shirt. Marisa has a black witch hat with white ribbons, and flies on a magic broom.

287.content: The Genbu Ravine is located near Youkai Mountain and Forest of Magic. The bottom looks like turtleshell. It's surrounded by six-sided cliffs, and a waterfall drops into a lake at the bottom. Nitori lives near the Ravine.

288.content: The Animal Realm is a skyscraper-filled metropolis located in Hell, with a forest known as the Primate Spirit Garden. The Animal Realm is filled with animal spirits and is a harsh environment relying on survival of the fittest. The animal spirits rule, and enslave human spirits. Notable leaders are Yachie and Saki.

289.content: Gensokyo is a place located somewhere around the Yatsugatake Mountains in Japan. It's a land of illusions: it is hidden from the Outside World, and surrounded by the Great Hakurei Barrier. Gensokyo's inhabitants are mainly creatures of Japanese Folklore and humans. Gensokyo is surrounded by Great Hakurei Barrier. Everyone speaks Modern Japanese. The technology in Gensokyo is similar to 1880s-era Japan.

290.content: The Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum is located under the Myouren Temple and is entered through a cave. It was the tomb of Toyosatomimi no Miko where she was sealed by Buddhist monks, but now serves as her home for her and her followers.

291.content: Rods of Remorse are carried by every Yama. It is used to beat sinners until they repent.

292.content: Eiki Shiki is a Yama living in Higan. Eiki is the Judge of the Dead for the Ministry of Right and Wrong. She has power to judge others using the Rod of Remorse and the Cleansed Crystal Mirror. Yuyuko is Eiki's subordinate. Eiki often scolds her servant Komachi. Eiki serves Hecatia. She is known to scold and lecture others, but does so with goodwill. Eiki has short green hair swept to the right and blue eyes. She wears a blue and white hat with a gold emblem, a blue and black uniform, and black shoes with red bows.

293.content: The Ministry of Right and Wrong is the organization that manages the afterlife. They decide who goes to Heaven or Hell. Hecatia Lapislazuli is the leader of Ministry. Eiki judges the souls of those who died and the Kishin hunt those who live too long.

294.content: Iku Nagae is an oarfish youkai. Iku has the power to read the mood of a place and perfectly adapt to it. She can cause storms using the Dragon God's power. Iku is the envoy of the Dragon Palace and lives in Heaven. She is loyal to celestials and Dragon Palace residents, and is Tenshi's friend. Iku is focused on her duties and is rather calm and businesslike. Iku has red eyes and blue hair. She wears a white and red frilly shirt, a long black skirt, and a black round hat with a very long red ribbon. Iku has a long white and red shawl along her arms and chest.

295.content: Nazrin is a mouse youkai. She can find anything she is tasked to look for. She lives in a shack on the Nameless Hill and leads a large flock of mice. Nazrin a skilled dowser, but is full of herself and easily frightened. She was sent by Bishamonten to watch over Shou and her Pagoda. Nazrin has short gray hair and red eyes, mouse ears and a thick mouse tail. She wears a black sleeveless dress with rectangular cutouts at the bottom, a white undershirt and a dull blue capelet. Nazrin wears black slippers, a crystal pendant, and carries two dowsing rods.

296.content: The Deep Road to Hell leads to Former Hell. It's green and gloomy. Parsee roams around here.

297.content: The Fantastic Blowhole is a location in the Underworld near the Deep Road to Hell. It's a cave that is always wet with a very strong wind. Kisume and Yamame live there.

298.content: Chang'e is a lunarian who was the mistress of all moon rabbits. She is now a prisoner on the moon for her entire immortal lifetime after drinking the Hourai Elixir. Junko has a major grudge against Chang'e for killing Junko's son. Hecatia Lapislazuli has a grudge against Chang'e since Chang'e's husband destroyed the suns that balanced the darkness of Hell.

299.content: Hot Spring Town is a resort in Former Hell. It is accessible from the Rainbow Cavern of Earth Spirits, and managed by Yuugi. Hot Spring Town has densely packed traditional Japanese houses. Hot steamy water constantly pours from up above. There are large hot springs everywhere, which oni and vengeful spirits use to bathe.

300.content: Sanae Kochiya is a shrine maiden. She can perform miracles and can summon Suwako or Kanako. Sanae is confident, energetic, and dutiful. She considers Reimu her rival, but also a friend. Sanae lives at and tends to the Moriya shrine. She has green eyes, and long green hair. Sanae wears a white and blue shrine maiden outfit with detached sleeves. She has a frog pin, and a long white snake decoration in her hair. Sanae also wears white kneesocks and black loafers. She is a descendant of Suwako.

301.content: Aya Shameimaru is a crow tengu reporter. She has power to manipulate wind. Aya is one of the strongest tengu, and one of the fastest. Aya lives somewhere on Youkai Mountain. She always looks for gossip, relying on aggressive reporting tactics and is prone to exaggerate. While Aya actually cares about the truth, she is somewhat full of herself. Aya runs a newspaper called the Bunbunmaru. She is Hatate's rival. Aya has red eyes and shoulder-length black hair. She wears a white blouse with a black ribbon, black skirt, red geta sandals and a red tokin. She usually carries a camera.

302.content: Bake-danuki are youkai tanuki. They have the ability to transform and disguise themselves as objects or other species. Bake-danuki can also transform leaves into other objects.

303.content: Were-hakutaku are humans with the ability to turn into a hakutaku on a full moon. Hakutaku are bovine youkai who bring good fortune and give sage advice.

304.content: Hakurouken is an ancestral wakizashi of the Konpaku family. Only Konpaku family members can wield it. Youmu owns it. It erases doubt from humans on attack. Ghosts achieve nirvana when cut by Hakurouken.

305.content: Jiang shi are zombie youkai that move by hopping around and can turn other humans into Jiang Shi by biting them. The zombification will only be permanent if the bite is fatal. They have stiff limbs and cannot think for themselves, usually following a master.

306.content: The Barrier of Life and Death is located in the sky and separates Gensokyo and the Netherworld. It takes the shape of a colossal door.

307.content: The Spring Path is a long mysterious path full of flowers and cherry blossom located near Misty Lake and the Forest of Magic.

308.content: Chiyuri Kitashirakawa is a human not native to Gensokyo. She can use artificial magic, is a bit excitable, and will often make situations much worse than they already are. Chiyuri has blonde hair and yellow eyes. She wears a white sailor uniform with a shade of blue which looks too small for her and a blue neckerchief. Chiyuri commands the Probability Space Hypervessel. She assists Yumemi Okazaki.

309.content: Former Hell is a region in the Underworld that used to be Hell. Due to overpopulation, the Yama moved Hell to a different location. It is accessed by the Deep Road to Hell, guarded by Parsee. The Palace of the Earth Spirits is found here. This place is the home of Yuugi, Satori, Koishi, Utsuho, and Rin.

310.content: Hisoutensoku is a nuclear powered mecha created by the kappa. It resembles a giant golden robot. It is used for advertising the Future Water Youkai Bazaar, but is often confused for all sorts of monsters.

311.content: The Road of Liminality is located at the back of the Youkai Mountain and is connected to the Sanzu River. Harmless ghosts roam around, and both youkai and humans built stands to sell their wares here.

312.content: The Primate Spirit Garden is a large park resembling a kofun burial mound, located in the Animal Realm. Part of it was transformed into a high-tech fortress by Keiki Haniyasushin. The animal spirits are trying to take back this region but are unable to defeat the Haniwa Army Corps defending it. Keiki and Mayumi live here.

313.content: The Jeweled Pagoda of Bishamonten is a spherical gem held in a pagoda-shaped case. It is owned and used by Shou. It can fire powerful laser beams. If shot at the ground, it will turn it into gems.

314.content: The Great Youkai Forest is located at the base of the Youkai Mountain. It's a forest known to block out sunlight allowing most youkai to live there in peace.

315.content: Matenshi is an angel residing in Makai. She has purple hair at medium length and purple eyes. Matenshi wears a blue dress with a blue apron that has a white cross design on it. She also has angel-like wings. She is known to be hostile to humans.

316.content: The Prismriver Sisters are Lunasa, Merlin and Lyrica. They form "the Phantom Ensemble". The Prismriver Sisters play concerts throughout Gensokyo. They live in the Ruined Western Mansion with Layla.

317.content: Saigyou Ayakashi is a youkai cherry tree living in Hakugyokurou. The Saigyou Ayakashi has a lot of dead bodies buried under it to seal its cherry blossoms. It drains life from those under its canopy. If it blooms, it will cause mass death.

318.content: Roukanken is a long-bladed katana created by youkai and wielded by Youmu Konpaku. Youmu likes to boast about the power of this sword, usually exclaiming "The things that cannot be cut by my Roukanken, forged by youkai, are close to none!". Supposedly, it can kill ten spirits with one stroke. The sheath is decorated with a flower and ofuda.

319.content: The Soul Torch is a small paper lantern which attracts phantoms when lit. It is used by Yuyuko Saigyouji. She can light or extinguish the torch from any distance.

320.content: The Miracle Mallet is a magical tool wielded by Shinmyoumaru. The Miracle Mallet can change the size of anything with its powers or grant the wielder's wish at the cost proportional to the scale of the wish. The Miracle Mallet can only be wielded by the inchlings.

321.content: The Sword of Hisou looks like a burning-red jian. It is wielded by Tenshi Hinanawi. It has the power to identify one's spirit, can cut through anything and use spirit energy. It can only be used and summoned by Tenshi.

322.content: Sagume Kishin is a lunarian divine spirit. Her ability reverses the course of any situation she speaks about. She speaks very little because of her ability, but is sharp and logical. Sagume has red eyes, short light grey hair with a princess braid around her head and a single angel wing on her back. She wears a purple dress whose bottom cuts off in an arrow pattern, a red microphone bowtie, a tan jacket with black alchemical symbols, and brown shoes.

323.content: Watatsuki no Toyohime is a lunarian princess and older sister of Yorihime. Toyohime possesses incommensurate luck, power, and can manipulate the physical and conceptual boundaries of the Moon and Earth, as well as mountains and seas. Toyohime has a gentle personality but is rather aloof. Udongein was her pet and Rei'sen is her current pet. Toyohime respects Eirin as her former teacher. She has long flowing blonde hair and golden eyes. Toyohime wears a white long-sleeved blouse with a blue dress over it, a loose belt, short purple boots and a white mobcap with a purple ribbon. She wields a fan that can purify things to the atomic level.

324.content: Unzan is a nyuudou or enlightened spirit who follows and guards Ichirin. He can make his fists grow to a massive size or shoot danmaku. Unzan takes the appearance of a pinkish cloud with the face of an angry old man, but he is quite shy and prefers that Ichirin speak on his behalf. Even then, he gives her insight when needed.

325.content: The Grassroots Youkai Network is a loose group of weaker and more docile youkai. They help each other and trade information.

326.content: Mike Goutokuji is a female calico Maneki-Neko. She has the power to bring either money or customers to a shop, but not both at once. She lives near Youkai Mountain. Mike loves haggling but prefers lazing around. She was rejected by other Maneki-Neko because she is a calico. Mike has short brown-orange-white hair, a cat tail and cat ears, and orange eyes. She wears a white shirt and skirt with brown and orange patches, leather bracelets and a choker with a gold bell. Mike carries a good luck koban coin and is barefoot.

327.content: Maneki-nekos are catpeople that bring good fortune to businesses. They are usually pure white but exceptions exist and are often rejected by the others.

328.content: Yamawaro are similar to Kappa but live in mountainous areas and thick forests rather than near bodies of water. They are rivals with Kappas. Yamawaros depend on Kappa technology but are better businesspeople.

329.content: Takane Yamashiro is a yamawaro living in the Youkai Mountain's forests. She has the ability to manipulate the Qi of the forest. Takane is more amiable than average yamawaro, and a good businesswoman. She is wary of humans but manages the Moriya Shrine cable car. Takane has fluffy shoulder-length green hair and dark green eyes. She wears a dark green camouflage dress with many pouches, a dark blue camo cap and brown boots. Takane carries a briefcase on her back with the key around her neck.

330.content: Sannyo Komakusa or Komakusa-dayuu is a yamajorou. She can manipulate minds with her pipe's smoke. Sannyo owns a gambling den on the Youkai Mountain. She is blunt and rough-spoken and a skilled manipulator. Sannyo has purple hair in a ponytail tied with a yellow bow, and red eyes. Sannyo wears a lavish purple kimono dress, a red vest with gold filigree and geta sandals. She carries a golden fan and a dragon-shaped smoking pipe.

331.content: Misumaru Tamatsukuri is a god. She can craft magatama from dragon gems and rare magical minerals. Her power lets her store abilities, emotions and memories in magatama. She crafted Reimu's Yin-yang orbs. Misumaru cares deeply about people and the environment. Misumaru has brown eyes and blonde and brown hair with a headband and hair ties decorated with dragon gems. She wears a red shirt with a purple vine pattern and white puffy sleeves, a yellow dress with a green vine pattern and a purple sash. Misumaru's clothing is decorated with many rainbow magatama. She is barefoot.

332.content: Tsukasa Kudamaki is a kuda-gitsune. She can use her power to find weak spots in people's souls. Tsukasa is trusted by many for her useful advice but is highly manipulative and mean-spirited. She is Megumu's right-hand woman. She has neck-length blonde hair,yellow eyes, blonde fox ears with white tips and a fox tail. Tsukasa wears a short white cheongsam with mint green laces and a plant design, white tabi socks and carries a test tube around.

333.content: Megumu Iizunamaru is a great tengu. She can manipulate the starry sky. She is one of the leaders of Youkai Mountain's tengu. She speaks respectfully but cares only for her position in the tengu hierarchy. Tsukasa and Chimata are her associates. Megumu has dark blue hair and red eyes. She wears a blue dress, a black coat with a jeweled gold pauldron and white puffs at the bottom, a blue tokin hat, black socks & purple geta sandals. She wields a camera tripod as a bludgeon.

334.content: Chimata Tenkyuu is a god of the marketplace. She can transfer the ownership of things from one person to another, including concepts or abilities. Chimata is polite but somewhat dramatic in her behavior, and very strung up on the rules of barter market. She hates profit-seekers, preferring those who wish to share the value of things. She is Megumu's and Tsukasa's associate. Her eyes and hair look like a dark sky. She wears a dress with sections of all colors of the rainbow connected by zippers, magenta boots and a cape whose inside looks like daytime sky.

335.content: Momoyo Himemushi is an oomukade. Her ability lets her devour dragons. She lives in the Rainbow Dragon Cave and mines Dragon Gems. Momoyo is incomprehensibly strong and emits deadly toxins, and thus respects anyone who dares approach her. Momoyo speaks in a very masculine manner. She works for Megumu. Momoyo has very messy gray hair and eyes. She wears a black shirt and skirt with gold swirls lined with many jade rings. Momoyo has many orange ribbons tied around her arms and legs, an orange sash around her waist and is barefoot. She carries a golden shovel and pickaxe.

336.content: Tokiko is a crested ibis youkai. She is weak and has no special abilities. Tokiko is curious and loves to read, often visiting places with large amounts of books. She has white hair with a blue front tuft and side bangs, small pointy blue horns, and red eyes. She wears a blue and black gothic dress with wide white sleeves, a large blue ribbon and black boots.

337.content: The Child of Miare is the reincarnation of Hieda no Are and the keeper of Gensokyo's knowledge. They live for a very short time but keep memories of their previous lives and are unable to forget things they see.

338.content: Yuuma Toutetsu is a Taotie. She has the ability to swallow anything and absorb it, and can also "eat" attacks. Yuuma is the head of the Gouyoku Alliance, and a rival of Saki and Yachie. Yuuma lives in the Animal Realm and visits the Sea of Petroleum and Abandoned Hell of Blood Pools for power. Yuuma is greedy and opportunistic. Yuuma has fluffy white hair like wool, and slitted red sheep eyes. She has long, pointy ears with gold earrings, and big red ram horns decorated with blue ribbons. Yuuma wears a blue dress with white patterns similar to Chinese bronzework and short red sleeves with exposed shoulders, a bronze talisman around her neck, and is barefoot. Yuuma carries a massive spoon she uses as a weapon.

339.content: The Gouyoku Alliance is an organization in the Animal Realm led by Yuuma Toutetsu and a rival to Yachie and Saki's organizations. They represent greed.

340.content: The Sea of Petroleum is a location in Hell which is filled with oil. It connects to the Abandoned Hell of Blood Pools. Yuuma Toutetsu frequents it to acquire power.

341.content: The Abandoned Hell of Blood Pools is a former Hell that contains pools that represents different sins. Yuuma Toutetsu uses these pools to power herself up.

342.content: A Taotie is a type of evil beast in Chinese mythology. They have sheeplike features and are creatures of corruption and greed.

343.content: The Rainbow Cavern of Earth Spirits is an underground passage located in the Forest of Magic, leading to the Hot Spring Town in Former Hell. Yamame sometimes lurks around.

344.content: Yukari, Okina and Kasen are the currently known sages of Gensokyo, and help maintain the Great Hakurei Barrier.

345.content: The Sorcerer's Sutra Scroll is an infinite scroll that only Hijiri Byakuren can wield. It contains an unlimited amount of spells and does not deteriorate. It can cast spells on its own, or enhance Hijiri's.

346.content: Omukade are youkai giant centipedes. Oomukade live under mountains and reach colossal sizes. They are rumored to be dragon-eaters and are assumed to be tremendously strong as a result.

347.content: The Shining Needle Sword is a magical needle used by Shinmyoumaru. It can fire beams from its tip and acts as a focus for her magic.

348.content: The Keiga Family is an organization in the Animal Realm led by Saki Kurokoma and a rival to Yachie and Yuuma's organizations. They represent brute force.

349.content: The Kiketsu Family is an organization in the Animal Realm led by Yachie Kicchou and a rival to Saki and Yuuma's organizations. They represent conniving and conspiring.

350.content: Mizuchi Miyadeguchi is a vengeful spirit. She can possess anyone regardless of strength. Mizuchi lives in Hell but roams Gensokyo in search of victims. She collects magical trinkets, and stalks Reimu to cause her trouble. Mizuchi has dark blue eyes and dark blue hair that fades to deep green in a ponytail, with two short braids to the sides and hairpins shaped like bundles of little ghosts. Mizuchi wears a black and white striped shirt and skirt over a short black dress. Mizuchi's legs stop at the thighs and dissipate into bluish mist. Her gloves have handcuffs with broken chains. Mizuchi has a very large handcuff around her neck, and uses the opposite cuff to catch possession victims.
